content.text:
でもailog langで実行したときの英文はその特徴が消えちゃってるけどね。
llmはplamo-2を使ってる。そういやこれっておすすめなのかな?
jsonをみてみて英文の評価をしてくれる?

en.content:
However, the English sentences generated when running in ailog lang seem to lose those characteristics.
LLM is using plamo-2. By the way, would you say this is a recommended configuration?
Could you take a look at the JSON and assess the quality of the English translations?
